title: Royal Enfield posts 2pc rise in sales at 76,187 units in Jan
description: "Our recently launched motorcycles continue to perform well across markets, and we have had a great start to the new year. We are confident that we will sustain our growth momentum for months to come," said B Govindarajan, CEO at Royal Enfield.
